title: Understanding the Client's Needs
text: Consider the situation where a client is not willing or able to take medication. What alternative treatment options could be beneficial in such cases?

title: Exploring Non-Medication Options
text: Think about therapeutic approaches that do not involve medication. What kind of therapy could support the client in managing their condition?

title: Identifying Adjunctive Therapies
text: If medication is not an option, what type of therapy can be used alongside other treatments to help the client?
